text:
HPM #SheikhHasina today issued directives for the @albd1971Govt to procure another 30 million doses of the #COVID19 #vaccine; she also asked the local #pharmaceutical companies of #Bangladesh to step up their own production efforts. 
See: https://t.co/sWmfA2lld0 
#VaccinesForAll https://t.co/NY2v7SQ4ee
